description: Nova's list results are not limited using the database query. User can only get list of all keypairs. This is inefficient. We should pass marker and limit parameters to the database query itself.
title: Keypairs list results not limited on database server-side

comments.content: Nova's list results are not limited using the database query. User can only get list of all keypairs. This is inefficient. We should pass marker and limit parameters to the database query itself.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~pkholkin

comments.content:
Is this bug superseded by blueprint keypairs-pagination [1]?

[1] https://blueprints.launchpad.net/nova/+spec/keypairs-pagination
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~mzoeller

comments.content: Look like this is a RFE and will be driven by the (not yet approved) bp.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~mzoeller
